comment: Dude be mad at the problem even though this chapter covers literally about testing and debugging. Also, if twelve lines of code is too much for you, you should probably get some rest lmao.
If in a test, I failed this problem I would be very mad at the problem. It's not something you can use "brainpower" to solve or realize you are wrong, but some nifty tricky trap.
I know, to get it right you have to read a line of code, it's just too much for me
